title: Legacy Client won't launch
body: Please help, Every time I try and launch the legacy Client it just says error and to check the logs for information, How do I fix this ):

replies.body: It's annoying cause I don't really care for the new client, I like the legacy one and I can't get on it!
I'd like to help, but not really sure what error you mean.  Where is this happening exactly, and what does it say?  Do you have a screenshot?  Let me know!
Thanks for your concern! But it works now! Thank you (:

For some:
Launch League under administrative.
Then click Launch Legacy
Solved it for me.

My thread may help. read chat,

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Bps5f2zp-anyones-client-not-working
